evidence.claim: Dapper Care utilizes AWS cloud services to manage scalable data infrastructure.
They ensure HIPAA compliance in the handling of health information through their APIs.
Integration with EHR systems is implemented via RESTful APIs and FHIR standards.
Dapper Care mentions using GCP for processing and storing sensitive health data securely.
Transaction sets for healthcare billing and claims processing are based on X12 standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions; focus on HIPAA compliant data management and FHIR APIs.
